doc.title: Business Startup Stories
doc.snippet: From spring to winter, from the library to Xinkai Lake, a set of hand-painted postcards drew the whole Nankai Universityâ€™s attention. They were designed by Ren Zhe and Liu Chaofan from the class of 2012 of the Department of Art Design, School of Literature, and was the first set of postcards published by Shiguang Nankai studio.
